Class GuiHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsoftware.ll13.client.handlers.GuiHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Handler
public class GuiHandler extends Object implements Handler
This class is used to handle the response received by the server (GUI)
